webApps.title: Forbidden Ramen
webApps.description: A modern restaurant app with bill splitting and tipping functionality, built with React and modern CSS.

webApps.title: News API (go-app)
webApps.description: A Go-based web application that allows users to search for news articles using the News API.

webApps.title: Weather App
webApps.description: Real-time global weather updates with a modern UI. Powered by Express, React, and WeatherAPI.

devOpsTools.title: DevKit
devOpsTools.description: A CLI tool that simplifies secure container development by turning complex, multi-step security processes into simple commands. Features include automated vulnerability scanning, security documentation generation, and secure Kubernetes deployments.

devOpsTools.title: CICD Goat
devOpsTools.description: A deliberately vulnerable CI/CD environment for learning CI/CD security through multiple challenges.

learningResources.title: Build Apps with Windsurf's AI Coding Agents
learningResources.description: Course and demos for building apps using Windsurf's AI coding agents, taught by Anshul Ramachandran.

creativeFun.title: Emojinomicon
creativeFun.description: A repository of SVG emoji assets for web projects, from backgrounds to cursors.

podcasts.title: Adventures in DevOps
podcasts.description: Come listen to experts in building infrastructure and enabling development and deployment processes discuss the ideas and technologies involved in DevOps. Hosted by Will Button and Warren Parad

podcasts.title: Fork Around And Find Out
podcasts.description: Your downtime from uptime, a chance to learn from expert's successes and failures. Hosted by Justin Garrison and Autom Nash

podcasts.title: Station 151
podcasts.description: A science-fiction podcast written by Andy Scearce and Steven James Scearce. It is produced by Bear Weiter and Pale Matter. Station 151 is Antarctica’s first and only astronomical radio observatory. Built by the Telders Corporation at an estimated cost of $200M USD, the station promises to reveal the darkest secrets of the universe. Join Astrophysicist Wayne Robertson at the bottom of the world as he sets off on the adventure of a lifetime (and possibly his last).

books.title: Clean Code
books.description: By Robert C. Martin - A handbook of agile software craftsmanship

books.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
books.description: By Martin Kleppmann - The big ideas behind reliable, scalable, and maintainable systems

youtubeChannels.title: LangChain
youtubeChannels.description: Learn more about building LLM applications with LangChain

youtubeChannels.title: IBM Technology
youtubeChannels.description: Whether it’s AI, automation, cybersecurity, data science, DevOps, quantum computing or anything in between, we provide educational content on the biggest topics in tech. Subscribe to build your skillset, learn about new trends, and gain insights from IBM experts.

youtubeChannels.title: The Coding Train
youtubeChannels.description: All aboard! The Coding Train is on its way with creative coding video tutorials on subjects ranging from the basics of programming languages like JavaScript to algorithmic art, machine learning, simulation, generative poetry, and more. Choo choo!

youtubeChannels.title: Kevin Powell
youtubeChannels.description: Helping you learn how to make the web, and make it look good while you're at it. With weekly videos and shorts, I'll be bringing you How Tos and Tutorials, as well as simple tips and tricks, with a big focus on helping people see how wonderful CSS is!

learningResources.title: freeCodeCamp
learningResources.description: Free interactive coding lessons and certifications

learningResources.title: DevOps Roadmap
learningResources.description: Community created roadmaps, guides and articles to help developers grow in their career.

learningResources.title: Codewars
learningResources.description: Achieve mastery through challenge. Improve your development skills by training with your peers on code kata that continuously challenge and push your coding practice.
